dialogue.text: EEP-!! What have you done with Boyfriend!?
Him and his little girlfriend is gone with the wind. That just leaves US.
Save your pathetic mumbling for after I kill you and take over this universe.
Now how about we make this quick, shall we?
P-Please, you don't have to do this...
You really haven't learned, have you...
For your stupidity, I'll make this as painful as possible for you.
Don't expect to stick around for long, you'll hit my trick very quickly, and you'll come crumbling away into the abyss.
You won't last a second against ME. Leonidas, the virus of your reality.
